title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: When launching the Help view, I need to first click on one of the interactive areas (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before it starts working. The tab key does not have any effect.
OB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not actually do anything.
EB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key should navigate the focus to the next interactive element.
SR:
1. Launch the Help view.
2. Press the tab key and observe that it does not navigate the focus to the next interactive element.
